entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:39 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the evening then changing to ice pellets mixed with snow before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
